tabs.tab_content:
• 12oz Mélange GREY FR fleece knit
  • 100% Cotton

• Aramid high tenacity FR thread(Black)
  • Bar-tacked at all stress points
  • OEM pattern removable snap hood with 2 pcs of 2″ X 2″ velcro on both ears’ part for mask adjustable by the velcros at neck part
  • One-way lockerd #5 resin zipper on aramid tape
  • FR rib knit cuff & waistband
  • 4 pcs 1″ x 2″ velcro on the inside of front pleat
• 2 front pouch pockets with resin zipper opening at waist

• HRC2
  • Arc Rating: ATPV='20.9' cal/cm2
  • ASTM F1506 and NFPA 70E
  • Material meets the requirements of
  • NFPA 2112-2012 UL certified
  • HRC2
  • OEKO-TEX Standard 100
